BasicInfo.short: WhatsApp is a proprietary, cross-platform, free instant messaging subscription service for smartphones.

Products.name: WhatsApp
Products.description: WhatsApp Messenger is a cross-platform mobile messaging app which allows you to exchange messages without having to pay for SMS.
